72B9375144FF4BCDC5784594CB8C039C: An environmental prop that applies Nitro to those around it when it is destroyed.
7DBA9A854BDD2A9CCD895E999ECCEFC7: An environmental prop that applies Nitro to those around it when it is destroyed.
ABEEC19745F1539DC1A3EDB81B8A9D69: An environmental prop that applies Nitro to those around it when it is destroyed.
A17C5EC645C874D630065CA36AD5AB43: Disables the device when receiving from the selected channel.
6480B4A0446374163AA14886F9A0633A: Enables the device when receiving from the selected channel.
3A1B14E145478FEACE47E0B8E1360191: Triggers when the barrel starts launching.

UserOptionDefinition.Device_NitroBarrelSpawner_C.AllowBarrelR: Allow the barrel to respawn after a RespawnDelay when it explodes.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_NitroBarrelSpawner_C.RespawnDelay: Determine how long it will take to respawn the barrel.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_NitroBarrelSpawner_C.bShouldRespa: Determine whether the device should respawn the barrel after it explodes during game.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_NitroBarrelSpawner_C.LaunchForceM: Determines the multiplier applied to the force used to launch the barrel.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_NitroBarrelSpawner_C.bStartEnable: Determines whether this barrel is enabled and visible when the game starts.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_NitroBarrelSpawner_C.DisallowBarr: Prevent the barrel from respawning. The RespawnDelay countdown will not start. If the countdown has already started, the barrel will not respawn when it ends.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_NitroBarrelSpawner_C.OnBarrelExpl: Triggers when the barrel gets exploded.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_NitroBarrelSpawner_C.OnBarrelLaun: Triggers when the barrel gets launched.
